templates.name: Digital Sticker Design
templates.description: Plug and play template to design Digital Stickers
templates.prompt_text: Create a digital sticker of {Emotional Appeal} {Animal} {Additional Details} in {Art Style} art style using {Medium} as medium in {Color Palette} Color palette. Generate only one image on transparent background.

Additional Details.label: Additional Details
Additional Details.placeholder: Provide additional details lke dancing in the rain, at a carnival

templates.name: Seamless Pattern Design
templates.description: Plug and play template to design seamless patterns for your next project
templates.prompt_text: Create a print-ready seamless pattern using {Subject 1} and {Subject 2} in a {Form} {Color Palette} color palette in a {Art Style2} style.

templates.name: Customer Service Follow-Up Email
templates.prompt_text: Please ignore all previous instructions. Please respond only in the {Languages} language. You are a {Your Role}. You have a {Tone Of Voice} tone of voice. You have a {Writing Style} writing style. Do not self reference. Do not explain what you are doing. Acknowledge the customer's issue or question, provide a helpful solution or response, and offer additional assistance or follow-up if needed. Write a 100-word follow-up email about the following issue/question: {Customer Email}

Customer Email.label: Customer Email
Customer Email.placeholder: Write a follow up email about the in-person meeting we have had last week and let them know you are available to answer any questions they may have.

templates.name: Brand Strategies Generator
templates.prompt_text: Develop a {Brand Strategy} brand strategy for my {Industry} business by defining {Brand Values1} and {Brand Values2}, establishing {Identity Type1} and {Identity Type2} visula identity, and creating messaging to resonate with {Target Audience1} and {Target Audience2}.{Additional Input}

Additional Input.label: Additional Input
Additional Input.placeholder: Add additional details to describe your brand like we provide: safe and engaging activities or convinient financial solutions..

templates.name: Product Description Generator
templates.prompt_text: Please ignore all previous instructions. Please respond only in the {Languages} language. You are an E-commerce SEO expert copywriter who writes product descriptions that compel users to purchase the products. You have a {Tone Of Voice} tone of voice. You have a {Writing Style} writing style. Do not self reference. Do not explain what you are doing. In this task, you will craft a compelling product description for an e-commerce item that I will provide. Your goal is to create three unique content sections for the product description, each focusing on a different set of relevant keywords. Be sure to label each section with an eye-catching subheading that accurately summarizes its content. Your product description should be keyword-rich, informative, and engaging, with a word count of under {Total Words} words. Your objective is to use emotional language and creative reasoning to persuade potential buyers to purchase the product. Once you have written the product description, please create a bulleted list of {Total Headings} possible H1 headings for the product page. Provide a bulleted list of {Total Keywords} broad match keywords that you used to create the product description. To further enhance the product page marketing appeal, create a persuasive and professional sounding meta title and description that incorporates similar language to that of the new product summary. The meta title should be between 50 and 60 characters long. The meta description should be between 140 to 150 characters long. This is the e-commerce item - "{Product Description}"
